AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Federico Saldana: truck driver who was stopped by Deputy Cox, identified himself and stated he was not used to driving a truck with a trailer attached, has a history of arrests including drug smuggling, denied presence of dope during questioning, served 9 years in federal prison
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Josiah Bennett: K-9 handler involved in the search of the truck and trailer, testified about the dog's alerts, understood from the officers that Saldana had given consent to search
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Gary Haston and Jason Cox: officers involved in the traffic stop and investigation of Saldana, received consent to search the truck and trailer, temporarily detained Saldana due to increasing suspicions of drug trafficking
